p.seg: State of Nebraska Department of Trade and Commerce Bureau of Insurance Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the Year 1020 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies for the Years 191 5, 19 16 1917, 1918, 1919 and 1920 J. E. HART, W. B. YOUNG, Chief of Bureau of Insurance Secretary of Trade and Commerce S. R. McKELVIE, Governor

To His Excellency: Hon. Samuel R. McKelvie, Governor. We herewith submit the summary of business of companies authorized to write insurance in this State for the year ending December 31, 1920, including the names of companies organized, admitted, reinsured, with - drawn etc., daring the year. DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND COMMERCE, J. E. HART, Secretary W. B. YOUNG, Chief of the Bureau of Insurance.
4 COMPANIES ORGANIZED DURING 1920 rn Accident and Casualty Co., Omaha. Licensed to write Accident and Health July 23, 1920.

NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT 5 COMPANIES ADMITTED IN 1920 Abielle Fire Insurance Company, Paris, France. Admitted May 10, 1920, licensed to write fire insurance. American Life Reinsurance Company, Dallas, Texas. Admitted May 6, 1920, licensed to write life, health and accident. Associated Employers Reciprocal, Chicago, Illinois. Admitted July 1, 1920, licensed to write employers liability and automobile. Bankers Inter-Insurance Alliance, Kansas City, Mo. Admitted July 21, 1920, licensed to write fire, lightening and tornado. British General Insurance Company, New York, N. Y. Admitted Sep - tember 22, 1920, licensed to write fire insurance. California Ins. Co., San Francisco, Calif. Admitted June 18, 1920, licens - ed to write fire and automobile. Cedar Rapids Life, Cedar Rapids, Iowa. Admitted February 10, 1920. Licensed to write life insurance. Central States Fire, Witchita, Kas. Admitted Oct. 13, 1920, licensed to write fire, lightning and tornado. Cloverleaf Life and Casualty Co., Jacksonville, Illinois. Admitted March 9, 1920, licensed to write life, health and accident. Columbus Mutual Life, Columbus, Ohio. Admitted August 17, 1920, li - censed to write life, health and accident. Consolidated Underwriters, Kansas City, Mo. Admitted Oct. 20, 1920, licensed to write liability and Workmen's Compensation. Continental Auto Ins. Association, Springfield, 111. Admitted May 29, 1920- Automobile (full coverage). Equitable Accident Co., Boston, Mass. Admitted May 11, 1920, licensed to write accident and health. Eureka Mutual Ins. Co., Philadelphia, Pa. Admitted May 6, 1920, licensed to write fire insurance. Farmers Live Stock Ins. Co., Des Moines, la. Admitted Nov. 10, 1920, licensed to write live stock insurance. Fraternal Order of Eagles, Seattle, Washington. Admitted June 9, 1920, licensed to write Fraternal Beneficiary Insurance. Hartford Live Stock, New York, N. Y. Admitted June 5, 1920, licensed to write live stock insurance . Hawkeye Securities Fire, Des Moines, la. Admitted Feb. 13, 1920, li - censed to write fire, tornado, automobile, hail. Hardware Dealers Mutual Fire, Stevens Point, Wis. Admitted May 25, 1920, licensed to write fire, lightning, automobile, fire and theft. Hudson Ins. Co., New York. Admitted May 27, 1920, licensed to write fire and marine. Liberty Life, Topeka, Kansas. Admitted May 15, 1920. Licensed to write life insurance.

6 London and Scottish Assurance Corporation, London, Eng. Admitted May 6, 1920, licensed to write fire insurance. Lumberman's Mutual Casualty, Chicago, 111. Admitted Sept. 20, 1920, licensed to write liability, workmen's compensation, fire, theft, col - lision and accident on automobiles. Merchants Fire, Denver, Colorado. Admitted July 1, 1920, licensed to write fire insurance. rinnesota Implement Mutual Fire, Owatonna, Minn. Admitted Feb. 2, 1920, fire, lightning, hail and windstorm. rational Underwriters, Chicago, 111. Admitted Sept. 22, 1920, licensed to write fire, lightning, hail, sprinkler leakage, windstorm. North American Fire, Des Moines, la. Admitted Nov. 1920, licensed to write fire, lightning, cyclone, tornado, windstorm and hail. North American Life ,Chicago, 111. Admitted May 6, 1920, licensed to write life, health and accident. Patriotic Assurance Co., Dublin, Ireland. Admitted May 6, 1920, licens - ed to write fire insurance- Potomac Ins. Co., Washington, D. C. Admitted May 6, 1920, licensed to write fire and marine. Preferred Risk Fire, Topeka, Kans. Admitted Sept. 22, 1920, licensed to write fire, lightning, tornado, explosion, riot and civil commotion. Reinsurance Life of America, Des Moines, la. Admitted July 1, 192D, licensed to write life insurance. Retail Hardware, Mutual Fire, Minneapolis, Minn. Admitted May 6, 1920, licensed to write fire and lightning. rinklered Risk Underwriters, Chicago, 111. Admitted May 6, 1920, licensed to write fire, lightning, h^il, sprinkler leakage and windstorm. rnion Indemnity Co., New Orleans, La. Admitted July 17, 1920, li - censed to write fidelity, surety, accident and health, plate glass, burglary, liability, workmens compensation, workmens collective.

NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT 7 COMPANIES WITHDRAWN. REINSURED, CHANGED NAME, ETC., DURING 1920. American Merchant Marine, New York, Withdrew. Business Men's Accident Association, Kansas City, Changed its name to Business Men's Assurance Company and be - came a legal reserve life insurance, writing life, health and accident. Catholic Mutual Benefit Association, Hornell, N. Y Withdrew. Court of Honour, Springfield, 111 Changed its name to "Court of Honour Life Association." European Accident, London, Eng., Changed its name to "European General Reinsurance Corporation." Farmers Mutual of Scottsblutf, Reinsured in Nebraska Mutual l of Lincoln, Great Eastern Casualty Co., New York, Reinsured in Union Indemnity of New Orleans Iowa State Live Stock reinsured in Farmers Live Stock of Des Moines, Iowa. Lincoln Accident changed to legal reserve and life and name to "Lincoln Accident and Life." Maryland Assurance, Baltimore, Mr., Withdrew Masonic Mutual Life, Washington, D| C, License revoked for failure to appear at a hearing. North American Fire, Des Moines, Iowa, Changed name to North American National. Republic Casualty, Pittsburgh, Pa., Withdrew. Standard Live Stock, Indianapolis, Ind., Withdrew. United British Ins. Co., London, Eng., Withdrew. Western Accident & Indemnity Co., Helena, Montana, Not licensed in 1920- Western Automobile Indemnity Association, Ft. Scott, Kansas, Changed name to "Western Automobile Ins. Co., Western National Life, Cheyenne, Wyoming, Withdrew.
